avatar.name: Avatar
avatar.storyline: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

pacific_rim.name: Pacfic Rim
pacific_rim.storyline: As a war between humankind and monstrous sea creatures wages on, a former pilot and a trainee are paired up to drive a seemingly obsolete special weapon in a desperate effort to save the world from the apocalypse.

kong_skull_island.name: Kong Skull Island
kong_skull_island.storyline: A team of scientists explore an uncharted island in the Pacific, venturing into the domain of the mighty Kong, and must fight to escape a primal Eden.

battleships.name: Battleship
battleships.storyline: A fleet of ships is forced to do battle with an armada of unknown origins in order to discover and thwart their destructive goals.

i_am_legend.name: I Am Legend
i_am_legend.storyline: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.
